titles.title: I Will Sing, I Will Sing

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Allelu, Alleluia, Glory to the Lord. (3x) Alleluia, Glory to the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We will come, we will come as one before the Lord. (3x) Alleluia, Glory to the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In His Name, In His Name we have the victory, (3x) Alleluia, Glory to the Lord.{/lang-eng}
